trans-unit.source: Provides a thread-safe collection that contains channel dispatchers.
This collection is used by <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase> to manage the channel dispatchers associated with the host.

A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherCollection> is created when <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.%23ctor%2A> is called and the collection can be accessed using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.ChannelDispatchers%2A> property.

The collection contains <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> objects (and not just instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher>) because it is also used by developers who want to keep the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]programming model but replace the system-provided runtime.

They derive a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> and extend <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> (which inherits from <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>) by overriding <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.InitializeRuntime%2A>, adding instances of the class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.ChannelDispatchers%2A>.
This class has no public constructors and is not intended to be used outside of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost>.
Removes all channel dispatchers from the collection.
Inserts a channel dispatcher into the collection at a specified index.
The zero-based index of the channel dispatcher to be retrieved from the collection.
The channel dispatcher to be inserted into the collection as an element.
The service host associated with the channel dispatcher collection is closed.
The index specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
The commutation object is not in a state
Removes a channel dispatcher at a specified index from the collection.
The zero-based index of the channel dispatcher to be removed from the collection.
The index specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
Replaces the channel dispatcher at a specified index with another item.
The zero-based index of the channel dispatcher to be replaced.
The channel dispatcher to replace
The service associated with this collection of channel dispatchers is in a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed"></xref> state.
The index specified is less than zero or greater than the number of items in the collection.
